ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_elnn0 | |- ( N e. NN0 <-> ( N e. NN \/ N = 0 ) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_nnaddcl | |- ( ( M e. NN /\ N e. NN ) -> ( M + N ) e. NN ) |
| 3 |  | #P_oveq2 | |- ( N = 0 -> ( M + N ) = ( M + 0 ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_nncn | |- ( M e. NN -> M e. CC ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_addid1d | |- ( M e. NN -> ( M + 0 ) = M ) |
| 6 | 3, 5 | #P_sylan9eqr | |- ( ( M e. NN /\ N = 0 ) -> ( M + N ) = M ) |
| 7 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( M e. NN /\ N = 0 ) -> M e. NN ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( ( M e. NN /\ N = 0 ) -> ( M + N ) e. NN ) |
| 9 | 2, 8 | #P_jaodan | |- ( ( M e. NN /\ ( N e. NN \/ N = 0 ) ) -> ( M + N ) e. NN ) |
| 10 | 1, 9 | #P_sylan2b | |- ( ( M e. NN /\ N e. NN0 ) -> ( M + N ) e. NN ) |
